sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"
import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container'
import Box from '@material-ui/core/Box'
import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'
import IconButton from '@material-ui/core/IconButton';
import CloseIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Close';
import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'
import Avatar from '@material-ui/core/Avatar'
import Divider from '@material-ui/core/Divider'

const useStyles = makeStyles({
  root: {
    position: 'relative',
    display: 'inline-block',
    width: '500px',
    background: "white",
    boxShadow: '0 0 14px rgba(0,0,0,0.25), 0 0 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.22)',
    zIndex:10
  },
  hide: {
    display: "none",
  },
  closeButton: {
   position: 'absolute',
   right: 5,
   top: 5,
   color: "grey",
 },
 image: {
   width: "100px",
   height: "100px"
 },
 topImage: {
   width: "100%",
   height: "200px",
   objectFit: "cover"
 },
});

const Midbar = props => {
  const classes = useStyles()

  return (
    <Box className={props.showMidbar ? classes.root : classes.hide}>
      <Box display="flex" flexDirection="column" alignItems="center">
        <Box mt={4}>
          <Avatar src={'/therapist-images/' + props.therapist.image} className={classes.image}/>
        </Box>

        <Box>
          <Box textAlign="center" fontSize="24px" mt={3}>
            {props.therapist.name} {props.therapist.surname}, MSW, LCSW
          </Box>

          <Box color="textSecondary" textAlign="center">
            Couples therapist
          </Box>
        </Box>
      </Box>


            <Box textAlign="center" mt={3}>
              Do you want help with your life, your work or your relationships? Let’s collaborate to lighten the obstacles to your best life!Do you want help with your life, your work or your relationships? Let’s collaborate to lighten the obstacles to your best life! I offer individual therapy, couples therapy, crisis intervention, pre-marital coaching, family therapy, trauma-informed therapy, personal coaching, and work-life balance coaching. I use best practices that evolve clinically following advances in the research. My couples therapy is informed by Dr. John Gottman‘s research and advanced training in Emotion Focused Couples Therapy. I am a founding board member of the Carolinas Center for Emotion Focused Therapy, and am a lifetime member of ICEEFT.
            </Box>

            <Box mt={3}>
              <Button variant="contained" color="secondary">
                Request a Session
              </Button>
            </Box>

            <Box textAlign="center" mt={3} color="primary">
                Experience: 30 Years
            </Box>

            <Box textAlign="center" mt={3} color="primary">
                Price: $180 per 1 hour session
            </Box>

            <Box textAlign="center" mt={3} color="primary">
                Education: University of Georigia MSW, LCSW
            </Box>

            <Box textAlign="center" mt={3} color="primary">
                Treatment Approach: Emotionally Focused Therapy
            </Box>

            <Box textAlign="center" mt={3} color="primary">
                Specialty Areas: Depression, Anxiety, Marriage
            </Box>

            <Box textAlign="center" mt={3} color="primary">
                Accepts Insurance: No
            </Box>

            <IconButton aria-label="close" className={classes.closeButton} onClick={() => props.setShowMidbar(false)}>
              <CloseIcon />
            </IconButton>


    </Box>
  )

}

export default Midbar
